COLD.DESCRIPTION: A Cool enemy deals 25% less damage with attacks. If a Cool enemy would become #yHot, it instead suffers from #yThermal #yShock for one turn, taking double its Cold amount in damage. Enemies suffering from #yThermal #yShock take damage instead of becoming Cool or #yHot.

CORPOREAL.DESCRIPTION: A Corporeal card is any card that did not start the turn in your hand, draw pile, or discard pile.

FLOW.DESCRIPTION: When you Flow, you may discard any number of cards. You draw that many at the start of your next turn.

Heat.DESCRIPTION: A Hot enemy takes 50% more damage from attacks. If a Hot enemy would become #yCool, it instead suffers from #yThermal #yShock for one turn, taking double its Heat amount in damage. Enemies suffering from #yThermal #yShock take damage instead of becoming #yCool or Hot.

SWAPPABLE.DESCRIPTION: A Swappable card is tied to another card and, while selected, can be freely 'Swapped' between the two. (Default key: Spacebar)

TRANSMUTE.DESCRIPTION: Transforms a card in combat into any card of the same rarity available to your current run.
